## Utils.ValidationHelpers class

A collection of validation and normalization helpers for constrained string types.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ValidationHelpers<T extends string, TC = unknown> 
```

`readonly`


</td><td>

Validation.TypeGuardWithContext&lt;T, TC&gt;


</td><td>

Determines is a supplied tag is well-formed and uses canonical formatting, according to the lexical rules defined for the tag validated by these helpers.
